gallery.title: Practitioners
gallery.body: Why should potential clients trust you with their care? Why do you practice in your field? Let a video profile show you are and answer commonly-asked questions. Alternatively, a video series can provide health and nutrition tips as a bonus service to your customers.

gallery.title: Artisans
gallery.body:
Your process for creating art is unique – so show the world what you do! Use a profile video to explain your process and the love you put into each piece you create.
Tell us about your passion. We’ll do the rest.

gallery.title: Businesses
gallery.body:
At TOLD we understand the long hours and challenges that come with running a business. So why do you do it? Let clients connect with you and your story through a profile video of your company.
A video series can answer commonly asked questions, provide tips or offer advice to customers visitng your website.

gallery.title: Non-profits
gallery.body: Use a video at your annual event, or send one as a way of saying “thanks” at the end of each fundraising season. Create a series of short character profiles for social media. The options are endless. Let video show the difference you are making in the world.

gallery.title: Schools
gallery.body: Stay relevant with a weekly campus news series, or tell prospective students why they should attend your school. Use a video to kick off a Capital Campaign, or record alumni memories to create an ongoing story archive. There are so many vibrant students and faculty members waiting to tell the world about your school - let them!

gallery.title: Event Coverage
gallery.body: Why put all that work into planning an event, only to have it forgotten weeks later? We have expandable event coverage services – from recording every detail, to filming the highlights throughout the event. A short video can capture the excitement of the moment so much more than photos can. Share it on social media and relive it all over again.
